name: Once upon a time when the Universe died
name_original: Once upon a time when the Universe died
description:
Welcome to the year 87069095065082069095068079079077069068 where nearly every lifeform has evaporated except for you and the whole civilization of ancient creatures seeking for something to c̵̢͙̉̈́͘ô̵̜̮̇̾n̶̜̒s̶̤̬̾̔ǔ̸̥̀́m̷͎̀̚e̷͙͎͔͒̈́̅... You are on your long and dangerous quest to escape the Universe and obtain the UNIVERSAL PEACE

Solve puzzles, use different types of matter, destroy the ancient creatures and accomplish your life goal...

FEATURES

  • 24+ levels! (5 in the current demo. May be more levels)
  • Challenging controls (you have to use only one mouse and and one mouse button)
  • Good sound design!
  • Minimalistic surreal(ish) abstract graphics
  • Spooky monsters!
  • Challenging puzzles!

WARNING: The game does not yet properly save your progress so it is better to play the demo till the end (5 minutes approximately)

Join the discord to get latest news about the game development: https://discordapp.com/invite/zRyuJzV
